scripts.test-csv: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=production node testcsv.js
scripts.create-prod: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=production node contorltest.js
scripts.create-dev: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=development node contorltest.js
scripts.sync-dev: cd config && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=development node sync-db.js
scripts.sync-prod: cd config && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=production node sync-db.js
scripts.start-prod-both: npm run sync-prod && npm run start-prod
scripts.test_config: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=production node config.js
